extendedInfo.description: Tires Plus, the free app from Tires Plus Total Car Care â the one tool every driver needs. Keep tabs on maintenance milestones and service recommendations, from the people that made your car. Plus, find cheap gas, keep track of mileage, call for roadside assistance, shop for tires, schedule service appointments at your local store, download service records from previous visits, and more.â¢ Maintenanceâkeep track of upcoming milestones from the people who made your car.â¢ Service Historyâeach and every service youâve had done on your vehicle, in one of our stores, will be on your smart phone. Plus, add your own service history records.â¢ Schedule Appointmentâmaximize your time and schedule an appointment to come see us right from the app.â¢ Find a Storeâno matter where you are, youâll have a Tires Plus Total Car Care close by. Using GPS, this app will locate the one closest to you.â¢ Special Offersâeveryone loves saving money. Now you'll be able to find special offers you need from us to keep your car running newer, longer.â¢ Find Cheap Gasâusing GPS this app will find the cheapest gas wherever you are.â¢ Mileage Trackerâevery time you fill up, just enter a couple numbers and this app will give you tips on how to maximize your gas.â¢ Parking Reminderânever forget where you park again.â¢ Roadside Aidâ24-7-365, this app will find you roadside help if you need it. Plus a list of safety tips when stranded.â¢ Driver Infoâcustomize to your preferences, so we can serve you better than ever.â¢ My Vehiclesâno matter how many vehicles your family has, this app can handle them all.â¢ Find Tiresâfind the perfect tire, right from the Tires Plus app.

reviews.title: Nice features!
reviews.comment: Well done, user-friendly app. Love being able to see recommended maintenance items. Downloading service records is a great feature too (but I don\'t go there for service). And I never knew I could call Tires Plus for roadside assistance!
reviews.author: Marc Lieberman

reviews.title: Fantastic App
reviews.comment: Tracks my service invoices or history done at the store.
reviews.author: Geso Karaage

reviews.title: Appointment scheduler doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: This app comes with several great features; you can download your service history from each tires plus store you go to, get maintenance suggestions for your car, and shop around for gas prices. However, there are two things about the app I don\'t like. One, there\'s no way to print or download the coupons  it offers so there\'s no way to use them off your phone. Two, whenever I schedule an appointment through the app the tires plus store never has a record that I schedule the appointment.
reviews.author: Justin Saylors

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: It\'s really cool to be able to download our service info. Can\'t wait to try some of the other options
reviews.author: Elizabeth Conard

reviews.title: Great app for Android Atrix phone
reviews.comment: This one saved my bacon this past week while on the road towing a camper. I woke to a low tire pressure warning on the tow vehicle while in an unfamiliar area. I pulled up the app, used the gps to locate the nearest store from Interstate 95 since I had new tires installed just 3 weeks ago and had some issues with the tire sensor. It provided turn by turn directions from where I was pulled over. The weather had been cold in South Georgia and they topped off my air and was on my way in minutes and not a problem since then. Because it also has my maintenance history I can check what all has been done on my car whenever I need to know.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but not great
reviews.comment: Little slow and display quality doesn\'t so good on big screen. Overall better than most apps I had used in the past.
reviews.author: Leeseng Vang

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Extremely easy to use and can keep track of my past services. Love it!

reviews.title: Great App!!!
reviews.comment: This app is very easy to download and use. I have been a Tires Plus customer for years. Find cheap gas, a parking reminder, special offers, maintenance schedule, shop for tires and my past service records. Fantastic! Thanks Tires Plus.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really great app!
reviews.comment: I just had service done on my car, and this app made it very easy for me to look that info up to keep for my record. Excellent features and functionality! I will be using the cheap gass feature a lot! Great job on a excellent app!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tire Plus app simply awesome!
reviews.comment: One easy way to schedule maintenance work, track, and print all your receipts. Also, helps to increase the resale value of your vehicle by simply having access to copies of your service records.
reviews.author: Rico n Laura Gibson

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Thanks tires plus for a awesome app very easy to use love your service
